request.description: Valid statuses: draft, preparing, in_transit, delivered, cancelled

body.raw:
{
    "payment_method": "gcash",
    "delivery_option": "deliver",
    "delivery_fee": 0.0,
    "distance": 0.0,
    "shipping_address": "123 Delivery Street, Siargao",
    "payment_proof_url": "https://example.com/proof.jpg",
    "notes": "Please deliver before 5 PM"
}

request.description: Submit a draft order. Only stores can submit orders. Changes status from draft to preparing. Minimum order amount: ₱5,000.00. Payment methods: cash_on_delivery, gcash. Delivery options: pickup, deliver. Shipping address required when delivery_option is 'deliver'. Delivery fee automatically calculated when deliver is selected (total quantity × ₱20.00)
